creator: hjia1@yahoo.com
text:
When we use ant1.5 to compile a Message Driven Bean with ejbjar task, the bean-
class is not included in the final EJB jar file.  Only the two deploy 
descriptor files are included.

This probelm exists since version 1.4, but version 1.3 works as expected.

Thanks,

Could you please provide some supporting info or example test cases. A
deployment descriptor and example bean classes would help. What vendor specific
elements are you using if any? A build file snippet would help too and perhaps
even debug output.

Thanks
creator: conor@apache.org

text: No contact from person reporting problem so closing
creator: conor@apache.org
